items.text: cuts hard but straight to short third man
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Rohan Naik: "We have 2 games which are pretty much similar in nature today, Ind vs SA and now this game, low scoring, tight chase, one man holding the fort, lets hope for the similar result for kiwis!"
items.text: nice drift in from around the stumps, Neesham gets well forward, perhaps trying to get outside the line, as he defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, no run

items.text: touch short and drifting in, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: gets well forward and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: squeezes this down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: steps out and works this indrifter to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, no run

items.text: steps out and works it against the turn to long-on, lazy effort in the deep. Should've anticipated it the moment he hit it. Poor, should've  never been a second there
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Neesham, 2 runs

items.text: lunges forward and defends back
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: turns this gently to the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: has he tickled this? Yes, yes. He has. Is there another twist? Taylor walks straight off, didn't even bother going up for a review. Strangulated down leg. Excellent catch by Mushfiqur, nifty footwork. Just the faintest of tickles as he was looking to work it fine.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, OUT

dismissal.text: LRPL Taylor c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mosaddek Hossain 82 (122m 91b 9x4 0x6) SR: 90.10

items.preText: Colin de Grandhomme walks out to a pressure situation. How will he respond?
items.text: punches down to long-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to de Grandhomme, 1 run

items.text: attacks the stumps with a flatter delivery, solidly defended
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, no run

items.text: squeezes the drive to mid-off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Neesham, 1 run

items.text: short of length on middle and leg, tucks this past square leg. Free-hit coming up as that was a massive no-ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Neesham, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: right into his hitting arc - a juicy full toss angling away, de Grandhomme loves width. Just belts this without a trace of worry, muscled to the cover boundary. As a batsman, you can't ask for an easier delivery to put away
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Grandhomme, FOUR runs

items.text: scythed to point, excellent stop
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Grandhomme, no run

items.text: short-arm jab to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Grandhomme, no run

items.text: driven firmly on the up to sweeper cover, brings up New Zealand's 200
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Grandhomme, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, kept out
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Neesham, no run

items.text: defended from the crease again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Neesham, no run

items.text: looks to cut, gets a thick outside edge that runs away past short third man
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to de Grandhomme, 2 runs

items.text: struck on the pad, beaten by the skid, but this was going down leg. Height in doubt too
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to de Grandhomme, no run

items.text: squirted off an inside edge to square leg, played down the wrong line as he lunged forward
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to de Grandhomme, 1 run

items.text: flatter one on middle, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Neesham, no run

items.text: fired one down leg, good grab by the keeper
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Neesham, 1 wide
